short_description: Hello, I'm Ivan Alexandrov. I spend considerable time learning new and cutting-edge web technologies and developing websites.
name: Ivan Alexandrov

about.text:
Hello, I'm Ivan Alexandrov. I spend considerable time learning new and cutting-edge web technologies and developing websites. Over the years I have learned a lot about web development and design, so you can be sure that the websites I create will be professional, modern and useful for your clients.

Ready to offer my expertise! Feel free to get in touch for an initial consultation.

images.name: inlineweb
images.title: Index page where all projects are displayed

works.title: InlineWeb: frontend playground
works.description:
It's like a normal frontend playground, but for itty.bitty-like web apps. User's apps don't need to be saved on a server, because all the content will be encoded in the url. URLs up to 4000 bytes can be saved on user's account and accessed through short aliases.

Compared to itty.bitty you can use secure local storage through custom functions. Each project's storage is encapsulated and can't be accessed from other projects.

works.title: OpenTabletop: play any tabletop game in browser
works.description:
Online project based on Vue.js and Firebase in which people can play any board games with friends

Features

  • Import/Export lobbies
  • In-game chat
  • Any type of dices
  • Counters
  • Lobby customization
  • Storage for decks

works.title: Business course website at the Moscow Association of Entrepreneurs
works.description:
A landing-page where people can view course information, how to get there and sign up for a course.
This website is fully responsive and mobile-friendly.

works.title: Online veterinary consultation
works.description:
A site where people can get a vet consultation. The first free consultation is carried out directly on the site, using a third-party widget
This website is fully responsive and mobile-friendly.

works.title: Web App for listening to youtube videos
works.description: You can listen music or podcasts from youtube with this web app. See animated demonstration of this in the link below

works.title: Design of leaflets for a business school
works.description: Two sided leaflets made for a business school at the Moscow Association of Entrepreneurs. The design of the leaflets had to be matched with the design of the site.

works.title: Design of leaflets for a web-design agency
works.description: Two sided leaflets made for a web-design agency located in russia. The design of the leaflets had to be matched with the design of the site.

works.title: Personal Portfolio / CV / Resume Website
works.description: This is a fully responsive one-page personal portfolio Website with modern & clean design. This website is fully responsive and mobile-friendly.
